text: John Vivian Pullin (1 November 1941 â€“ 5 February 2021) was an England international rugby union player. He played club rugby for Bristol Rugby and captained the England national rugby union team for which he played 42 times between 1966 and 1976. He also played for the British Lions. He was born in Aust, Gloucestershire. Pullin died on 5 February 2021 in Bristol, England at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Gloucestershire
title: John Pullin
